Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • final class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates new cards template and helps to manipulate between different cards.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int index
      used as first index of 2D array playerCard[][].
      private java.lang.String message
      This will store the message of how a player won.
      private java.lang.String name
      Holds name of player on his respective card.
      private int[] numbers
      singleNumber - holds the number of particular card from predefined numbers.
      private Card[][] playerCard
      At each index it stores a player with 3 cards on its sizeindex.
      private java.util.Random random
      object of Random class used to generate new random objects.
      private int[] randomCheck
      Holds all the randomly generated cards ,is used to check if new generated random card is not already used.
      private char singleCard
      singleCard - holds the type of particular card from predefined type.
      private int singleNumber
      singleNumber - holds the number of particular card from predefined numbers.
      private Card[] totalCard
      holds all the random generated cards,with their card number and card type.
      private char[] type
      singleCard - holds the type of particular card from predefined type.
      private Card[] winner
      This will store the array-object of cards of the winner player .with each card of winner player on its respective index.

        This method generates and stores new random cards for given players.

      • typeCapture

        private char typeCapture(int number)
        Parameters:
        number - takes the number(form deck of 52 cards) of a card.
        Returns:
        Its suit type for 4 predefined types.

      • getNumber

        private int getNumber(int number)
        Parameters:
        number - takes the number(form deck of 52 cards) of a card.
        Returns:
        Its card number (from 2 to 14).

      • maxCard

        private Card maxCard(Card[] card)
        Parameters:
        card - Takes array of cards of a given player.
        Returns:
        Highest card of that player.

      • maxTypeCheck

        private Card maxTypeCheck(Card card1,
                          Card card2)
        Parameters:
        card1 - Takes card with Highest card number in cards of player, which clashes with other card of same number.
        card2 - Takes card with Highest card number in cards of player, which clashes with other card of same number.
        Returns:
        The card with higher type priorty of the given 2 cards.

      • numberToString

        private java.lang.String numberToString(int data)
        Parameters:
        data - Takes the card number of a card(from 2 to14).
        Returns:
        J for 11,Q for 12,K for 13 and A for 14.

      • sameNumber

        private boolean sameNumber(Card[] card)
        Parameters:
        card - Takes array of cards containing all 3 cards of a player .
        Returns:
        If the given cards are of same number or not.

      • checkWin

        private Card[] checkWin(Card[] card1,
                        Card[] card2)
        Parameters:
        card1 - Takes array of cards containing all 3 cards of a player 1.
        card2 - Takes array of cards containing all 3 cards of a player 2.
        Returns:
        The winner among both the players and winning reason of a player as a message.
